name: Trax (J. Lucas)
overview: An arena, some cover and a trusty tank for each of us. What fun we'll have! Based on Combat for the Atari VCS. The object is simple, destroy your opponent as quickly as possible. Only one shot per tank can be on the screen at one time. This can be modified in the setup, if desired. Game created by J. Lucas, M. Taylor and D. Vernon.
